rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a small reception area to welcome guests. Complies with local norms and Vastu for auspicious entry.
An open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring Scandinavian minimalist design and plenty of natural light through large windows placed in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
A modern dining space adjacent to the living area. Features clean lines and uncluttered aesthetics typical of Scandinavian design.
Guest room featuring a queen-sized bed with built-in storage compartments following Vastu for restful sleep.
A functional bathroom with modern fixtures. Strategically placed to ensure privacy and positive energy flow.
A dedicated home theater space with acoustic treatments and ambient lighting, providing an immersive cinematic experience. Positioned away from noisy areas per local building norms.
An open central courtyard serving as a focal point for natural ventilation, sunlight exposure, and garden integration in line with Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu principles.

openings.description: A welcoming main entrance door aligned with auspicious directions per Vastu guidelines.
Large windows to ensure ample natural light and cross ventilation, adhering to Scandinavian design principles.
